questions.label: How much time do you have?

history.title: History & Old Town
tips: Start at Piața Unirii and St. Michael’s Church, the historical heart of the city.
Walk through the old town and check out Austro-Hungarian architecture.
Visit the local History Museum if you're into deeper context.

art.title: Art & Creative Vibes
tips: Visit the Art Museum (Banffy Palace).
Explore Cluj’s murals and street art around the central area.
Drop by local galleries and artsy cafés.

nature.title: Nature & Scenic Views
tips: Climb Cetățuia Hill for panoramic city views.
Stroll through Central Park and along the Someșul Mic river.
If you have extra time, explore trails outside the city.

cafes.title: Café Culture
tips: Try some of Cluj’s specialty coffee spots near the center.
Do a mini 'coffee hop' while sightseeing.
Pick cafés with terraces or street views for the full vibe.

nightlife.title: Nightlife Fun
tips: Start at a chill bar or pub for craft beer or cocktails.
Then continue to clubs or live-music venues—Cluj is a student city, always lively.
Check for DJ sets or concerts if you're visiting on a weekend.

mixed.title: A Mix of Everything
tips: Kick off with a historical spot or museum.
Add a viewpoint, a café break, and a bit of art.
End the day with local food and bar hopping.

local_romanian.title: Local Romanian Dishes
tips: Choose traditional restaurants serving sarmale, mici, and ciorba.
Try local pastries and regional comfort foods.
If offered pálinka—just know it’s strong, but authentic.

fast_food.title: Fast Food
tips: Explore local bakeries, sandwich shops, and street food stands.
Perfect if you want to maximize sightseeing time.
Pair it with a quick coffee or beer instead of a full sit-down meal.

fancy.title: Fancy & Modern Cuisine
tips: Reserve a dinner at a modern fusion restaurant.
Look for places with good wine lists and ambiance.
Ideal for your evening after an active day.

vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Options
tips: Choose restaurants with dedicated veggie dishes—Cluj has plenty.
Combine hearty salads, pasta, and local cheeses.
Cafés and bistros often have plant-based options even if not advertised.

anything_good.title: Anything Delicious
tips: Mix it up: traditional lunch + more international or modern dinner.
Try at least one local classic and one dessert.
Don't skip bakeries—they're often hidden gems.

low.title: Budget-Friendly
tips: Focus on free attractions: parks, viewpoints, old town.
Eat at bakeries, street food vendors, or daily menus.
Choose pubs instead of premium cocktail bars.

medium.title: Moderate Budget
tips: Mix free activities with select paid museums or attractions.
Traditional restaurant for lunch, simpler dinner in the evening.
For nightlife: one good bar + one more relaxed stop.

high.title: Treat Yourself
tips: Include premium spots: rooftop bar, fine dining, tasting menus.
Say yes to dessert, wine, or cocktails—it's part of the experience.
Plan fewer stops but higher quality.

relaxed.title: Relaxed Pace
tips: Plan fewer locations and stay longer at each spot.
Add more breaks for coffee, desserts, and people-watching.
2–3 highlights are enough for the day.

active.title: Active Adventure
tips: Combine climbs, long walks, and several attractions.
Short food stops—keep the momentum going.
Perfect for full-day itineraries with variety.

balanced.title: Balanced – Half/Half
tips: Do an active morning, then relax in the afternoon.
Mix 1–2 high-energy activities with chill café time.
Evening can lean either way—bar or peaceful city stroll.

full_day.title: Full-Day Itinerary
tips: Morning: main square, church, first museum.
Afternoon: parks, viewpoints, and an extra attraction.
Evening: local dinner + bar/club or illuminated city walk.

half_day.title: Half-Day Itinerary
tips: Focus on one main zone—center + viewpoint.
Choose one solid meal instead of multiple food stops.
Stay within walking distance to save time.

evening.title: Evening Plan
tips: Start with a short walk through the center at sunset.
Have dinner at a cozy spot with local dishes.
Move on to a bar, pub, or club depending on your vibe.
